programme.title: Dark Side of the 90s
programme.desc: The Viper Room was a refuge for young Hollywood to hide from the prying eyes of the press, until one fateful night when the death of a rising star instantly made it headline news.

programme.title: Dark Side of the 90s
programme.sub-title: Trash TV: Dirty and Deadly Talk
programme.desc: As 1990s talk TV evolves from the cerebral "Donahue" to the trashy "Jerry Springer," the new format fuses combustive relationships, shock and violence to entertain the masses.

programme.title: Dark Side of Football
programme.sub-title: Once a Raider, Always a Raider
programme.desc: The Oakland Raiders hold the dubious title of Dirtiest Team in the NFL investigating what happens when the Oakland Raiders sign the biggest pariah in the modern era: Bill Romanowski.

programme.title: Dark Side of Football
programme.desc: Chad Johnson's theatrics off the field lead to the demise of his career investigating why Johnson and so many others whose antics distracted from their play are all wide receivers.

programme.title: Dark Side of the Ring
programme.desc: Art collides with real life when the mythical love story between wrestling icons Randy Savage and Miss Elizabeth explodes beyond the ring with tragic consequences.

programme.title: Dark Side of the Ring
programme.desc: In one of wrestling's most infamous off-script moments, wrestler Bret Hart is stripped of his championship title through a backstage plot of betrayal that forever changes the sport.

programme.title: Dark Side of the Ring
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious Death of Gorgeous Gino
programme.desc: New revelations about wrestling star Gino Hernandez's death are revealed to his mother his death was believed to be a drug-related murder.

programme.title: Dark Side of the Ring
programme.desc: Chavo Guerrero Jr., Tommy Dreamer and Ben Kissel join Chris Gethard in studio to discuss the life, tragedy and legacy of Chris Benoit.
